name: Morning Routine
description:
Interactive game when you play the teenager's morning routine.

Game Design: Moeva Mondoha

Autors: Nicolas Bertrand - Théo Gautier - Enzo Onesti - Moeva Mondoha

Code & Integration: Théo Gautier - Moeva Mondoha

Art: Théo Roriguez

Made in 50 hours during the Game Jam+

WARNING: This is only available in French version.
